scripts.test:integration: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-tests no-parallel
scripts.test:integration:aave: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-suite Aave
scripts.test:integration:compound: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-suite Compound
scripts.test:integration:lido: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-suite Lido
scripts.test:integration:rari: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-suite Rari
scripts.test:integration:yearn: yarn build && bash run_tests.sh integration-suite Yearn
scripts.coverage:integration: cross-env HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet HARDHAT_FORK_NUMBER=13281002 npx hardhat coverage --testfiles "integration-tests/**/*.ts"
scripts.deploy-local:fork:mainnet: cross-env HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.local.fork.ts --network localhost
scripts.deposit-local:fork:mainnet: cross-env HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx hardhat run scripts/deposit.local.fork.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy-ci:fork:mainnet: cross-env HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.local.fork.ts
scripts.verify:pool:lido: cross-env TEMPUS_POOL_CONTRACT=LidoTempusPool npx hardhat run scripts/verify.pool.ts
scripts.verify:pool:yearn: cross-env TEMPUS_POOL_CONTRACT=YearnTempusPool npx hardhat run scripts/verify.pool.ts
scripts.verify:pool:rari: cross-env TEMPUS_POOL_CONTRACT=RariTempusPool npx hardhat run scripts/verify.pool.ts
scripts.mythx-pool: mythx --ci --yes analyze --wait --solc-version 0.8.10 contracts/TempusController.sol contracts/pools/AaveTempusPool.sol contracts/pools/CompoundTempusPool.sol contracts/pools/LidoTempusPool.sol contracts/pools/RariTempusPool.sol contracts/pools/YearnTempusPool.sol
scripts.mythx-misc: mythx --ci --yes analyze --wait --solc-version 0.8.10 contracts/stats/Stats.sol contracts/token/TempusToken.sol contracts/token/vesting/ERC20Vesting.sol contracts/PositionManager.sol contracts/otc/TempusOTC.sol
